description: T.3 Tilia - Crown lift to 6m from ground level. T.5 Robinia - 20% Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood. T.6 Acer Campestre - Crown lift to 6m from ground level. T.7 Acer Campestre - Crown lift to 6m from ground level. T.9 Beech - 15% Crown thin & inspect cavity. T.13 Holm Oak - 1m Holistic crown reduction to previous points. T.14 Robinia - 15% Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood. T.16 Acacia - 15% Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points. T.17 Holm Oak - 1m Holistic crown reduction to previous points. T.18 Holm Oak - 1m Holistic crown reduction to previous points. T.19 Prunus Pissardii - 30% Holistic crown reduction & deadwood (in decline). T.21 Euclayptus - 20% Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points. T.22 Acacia - 20% Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points. T.29 Robinia - 6m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood. T.30 Crataegus - Fell. T.31 Gledistia - 1m Holistic crown reshape to suitable growth points. T.33 Gleditsia - Reduce leaders encroaching on T.34. T.41 Plane - 15% thin of weaker crossing limbs. T.42 Plane - 4m Lateral reduction over tennis courts, balance remaining crown to suitable growth points & 15% thin of weaker crossing limbs. T.43 Cedar - 50cm Lateral reduction of lowest external growth to suitable growth points, remove crossing branches and deadwood. T.44 Oak - 1.5m Lateral reduction to suitable growth points, rebalance & deadwood. T.45 Hornbeam - Fell. T.46 Olive - Approx 45cm reduction to previous points.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
